includedAssets.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: The Curse Of The Black Pearl
includedAssets.synopsis: Johnny Depp and Orlando Bloom cross swords with ghostly sea dog Geoffrey Rush in a hearty adventure on the high seas.

includedAssets.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
includedAssets.synopsis: Johnny Depp's swaggering Captain Jack returns, taking the fight to soul-sucker Davy Jones. Swashbuckling sequel.

includedAssets.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
includedAssets.synopsis: Johnny Depp returns in a scorching sequel that sees Will and Elizabeth try to unite the pirate lords against vile blaggard Lord Beckett.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Johnny Depp returns in a scorching sequel that sees Will and Elizabeth try to unite the pirate lords against vile blaggard Lord Beckett.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Johnny Depp returns in a scorching sequel that sees Will and Elizabeth try to unite the pirate lords against vile blaggard Lord Beckett.

includedAssets.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
includedAssets.synopsis: Ahoy me hearties, Captain Jack Sparrow's back on the high seas once more, and this time he has a new wench for company. The feisty Angelica (Cruz) is not only Jack's first mate and rival, but daughter to the villainous Blackbeard (McShane), intent on helping her father find the fountain of youth so that he can outlive a fatal curse. Aboard the mighty Queen Anne's Revenge the three set sail, followed closely by a peg-legged Barbossa (Rush, now a privateer for the King's navy), and a Spanish fleet, in a frantic race to get their mitts on the fountain's live-giving waters.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack Sparrow is on the hunt for the Fountain of Youth, but can he outwit the fearsome Blackbeard? Fantastic fourth adventure starring Johnny Depp.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ahoy me hearties, Captain Jack Sparrow's back on the high seas once more, and this time he has a new wench for company. The feisty Angelica (Cruz) is not only Jack's first mate and rival, but daughter to the villainous Blackbeard (McShane), intent on helping her father find the fountain of youth so that he can outlive a fatal curse. Aboard the mighty Queen Anne's Revenge the three set sail, followed closely by a peg-legged Barbossa (Rush, now a privateer for the King's navy), and a Spanish fleet, in a frantic race to get their mitts on the fountain's live-giving waters.

includedAssets.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: An eccentric pirate attempts to reclaim his lost ship and discover a way to remain at its helm for eternity. Smash-hit franchise based on the classic Disney theme park ride. Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightly, Bill Nighy, Tom Hollander, Penélope Cruz and Ian McShane star.
